title: Happily Ever MAYBE
description: Shannon Sorrento’s journey continues with Happily Ever MAYBE in this compelling story about moving on after her failed marriage to Brody O’Connor.She had accepted the fact that maybe happily ever after didn’t exist for her until she met Jayson Russo, the tall handsome man on the train. Jayson came into Shannon’s life when she least expected it.Will Jayson be her happily ever after?Will Brody come back into her life?Or will Shannon continue her journey on her own?It’s a story about opening yourself up to new possibilities. To staying true to yourself. And happiness.
author: Sharon A. DeNofa
